headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Ecolab (ECL) After Its Strong Multi‑Year Share Price Run?
summary: For investors wondering if Ecolab at around US$281.99 is offering fair value or asking too much, especially after a strong run, this article is aimed at helping you answer that question. Over the last month the stock has returned 7.4%, with a 1-year return of 13.9% and a 3-year gain of about 7x, which raises questions about both growth potential and the current level of risk. Recent attention on Ecolab has focused on its role in water, hygiene and infection prevention solutions across...
